opportunities to get promotion.

SKILLS

§ Good team work  
§ Good at presentation 
§ Capable of working and functioning independently  
§ Fast learning, quick to adapt, capable of multitasking, high performance 
teamwork, self-motivated, having confidence in communication and full 
awareness of responsibility  
§ Excellent communication, especially in human relations 
WORK EXPERIENCE
